m_szDocSumamry: Hyundai ix35 Fuel Cell's hydrogen achievements Iain Curry |                                                   18th Dec 2015 5:00 PM Iain Curry RECORD BREAKER: Hyundai ix35 Fuel Cell breaks the hydrogen SUV land speed record in California. Not much competition out there, but it's a win nonetheless. Related Items Local Real Estate Subscribe Now NOW we've all come to accept hybrid and fully electric vehicles as the future of motoring, we mustn't forget that other alternative fuel source, hydrogen.
